sb.options.marioMode.tooltip: Loads mario textures and sounds on button :)
sb.options.screenShake.tooltip: How much screen will shake on button edge hit
sb.options.rotateSpeed.tooltip: How fast button will rotate on fly (no impact on physics, just a visual effect)
sb.options.rotateSharpness.tooltip: How sharp rotation will be (button rotates smoothly to fix hard fixes when it's on ground, so this is why I created it)
sb.options.scoreFlashSpeed.tooltip: When score increases, the text is flashing yellow color, so... this variable controls speed of flashing
